title: 服务器登录出错！
txt_content:
服务器进不去 服务端出现

 但是并没有这2个mod

replies.author: 酱瓜
replies.txt_content: 请报告服务端版本，看提示的确是服务端有mod而客户端没有……

replies.author: MC_apple
replies.txt_content:
国家关了新版登录插件就这样
config文件 然后找到这些
都弄false
Protection:
  enableProtection: false
  countries:
  - US
  - GB
  countriesBlacklist:
  - A1
  enableAntiBot: false
  antiBotSensibility: 5
  antiBotDuration: 10
VeryGames:
  enableIpCheck: false

replies.author: Stagnate_小萌
replies.txt_content: 喝服务端扯不上关系，客户端有问题！
